reviewText: Short and sweet and pretty simple but a good bit of fun. Only one song on the soundtrack and it will burrow into your head like a brain parasite. I played it all the way through and had a good time the whole way.
voteText: 6 of 6 people (100%) found this review helpful 1 person found this review funny

reviewText:
I completely recommend this game for $5.00, but not much more than that.

The graphics are pretty outdated, but the gameplay is pretty solid.  It's challenging in some spots, others not so much... just like any game.  In my own opinion, it's pretty rare to find a straight-forward tower defence game such as this.  Have had this game for a few years now, and it's one I find myself going back to every so often.

Again, not the best graphics, but if you're looking for some solid gameplay for a few bucks, this a totally worthy investment, in my eyes, for about $5.00.
What a fun game! I was hooked.
voteText: 3 of 5 people (60%) found this review helpful

reviewText: This game isn't very good for a tower defence game. The scoring is very easily abused.\n\nI let the final boss eat the children, because they are only worth 100 points. But selling all my buildings is worth tens of thousands of points. Sorry kids, but you are monster food.

reviewText: I got this game a few years ago when I was on a big tower defense kick. I have to admit it was mistake. The game basically plays itself, the graphics are terrible and the experiance is just no fun. Do not waste your time or money on this game.

reviewText: This game is great! nice, cheery, graphics and music i had a blast playing this TD game!
A cute little Tower Defence game that is deceptively difficult at times. Only downside is the lack of replayability. Well worth a couple of bucks.
